text: aur hamane raatree tatha divas ko do prateek banaaya, phir raatree ke prateek ko hamane andhakaar banaaya tatha divas ke prateek ko prakaashayukt, taaki tum apane paalanahaar ke anugrah kee (jeevika) kee khoj karo aur varshon tatha haî€¼isaab kee ginatee jaano tatha hamane pratyek cheez ka savistaar varnan kar diya
